name: Unknown Speaker 3
line: Food court? You sure they said food court?

name: Unknown Speaker 4
line: I'm sorry, have my translation skills been letting you down?

name: Unknown Speaker 5
line: We don't know it's your kids.

name: Unknown Speaker 8
line: Keep her talking. Keep her awake, okay?

name: Mike
line: Hey, hey, hey. Stay awake, stay awake. Let's get her on this side, on this side.

name: Robin
line: It's, uh... You know, it's not actually that bad. There was a... The goalie on my soccer team, Beth Wildfire, this other girl slid into her leg, and the bone came out of her knee, six inches or something, it was insane.

name: Mike
line: Okay. All right, El? This is gonna hurt like hell, okay?

name: Jonathan
line: Need you to stay real still. Here, you're gonna want to bite down on this, okay?

name: Dustin
line: Jesus Christ. Holy shit. Holy shit.

name: Eleven
line: Stop! Stop! I can do it. I can do it. God! God!

name: Mike
line: The Mind Flayer, it built this monster in Hawkins, to stop El, to kill her and pave a way into our world.

name: Nancy
line: And it almost did. That was just one tiny piece of it.

name: Lucas
line: It sorta destroyed your cabin. Sorry.

name: Steve
line: Okay, so, just to be clear, this... this big fleshy spider thing that hurt El, it's some kind of gigantic... weapon?

name: Steve
line: But instead of, like, screws and metal, the Mind Flayer made its weapon...

name: Steve
line: Yeah, okay. I... Yeah, I'm just making sure.

name: Joyce
line: Are we sure this thing is still out there, still alive?

name: Will
line: El beat the shit out of it, but, yeah, it's still alive.

name: Max
line: But if we close the gate again...

name: Will
line: We cut the brain off from the body.

name: Murray
line: Yoo-hoo! Yoo-hoo! Okay, this is what Alexei called 'the hub.' Now, the hub takes us to the vault room.

name: Murray
line: Right here. I don't know the scale on this, but I think it's fairly close to the vault room, maybe 50 feet or so.

name: Erica
line: More like 500. What, you're just gonna waltz in there like it's commie Disneyland or something?

name: Erica
line: Listen, Mr. Bunman, I'm not trying to tell you how to do things, but I've been down in that shithole for 24 hours. And with all due respect, you do what this man tells you, you're all gonna die.

name: Murray
line: I'm sorry, why is this four-year-old speaking to me?

name: Erica
line: Um, I'm ten, you bald bastard!

name: Dustin
line: She's right. You're all gonna die, but you don't have to. Excuse me. Sorry, may I?

name: Dustin
line: Okay, see this room here? This is a storage facility. There's a hatch in here that feeds into their underground ventilation system. That will lead you to the base of the weapon. It's a bit of a maze down there, but between me and Erica, we can show you the way.

name: Hopper
line: You can show us the way?

name: Dustin
line: Don't worry, you can do all the fighting and the dangerous hero shit, and we'll just be your... navigators.

name: Erica
line: Well, that settles it. He's gonna die. They're gonna die.

name: Hopper
line: We could've really used you guys down there.

name: Steve
line: Could've used you up here, too.

name: Lucas
line: Yeah, man. We missed you, dude.

name: Dustin
line: I missed you guys, too. Big-time.

name: Erica
line: Keep saying my name, see what happens.

name: Hopper
line: Hey, heads up. You can navigate, just from someplace safe.

name: Erica
line: The signal won't reach. Not with this. You need something with a high enough frequency band to relay with the Russians' radio tower. But for that to work, you need someone who has both seen their comms room and has access to a super-powered handcrafted radio tower, one preferably already situated at the highest point in Hawkins. Oh, wait. That's me.

name: Dustin
line: If you want us to navigate, you got us. But we need a head start. And a car.

name: Steve
line: Oh, man, now this... this is what I'm talkin' about!

name: Steve
line: Oh, screw Todd! Steve's her daddy now.

name: Robin
line: Did you just talk about yourself in the third person?

name: Erica
line: Did he just call himself daddy?

name: Steve
line: All right, where are we going?

name: Joyce
line: Bottom lock, second-to-top lock, third-to-top lock, top lock. Listen to me, I need to end this, but I will be back before you know it, okay?

name: Joyce
line: No, listen. You're gonna be safe there. It's... It's far away from all this. You just stick close to your brother and... and do whatever he says. No matter what. Okay?

name: Will
line: I'm not worried about me, Mom, I'm worried about you.

name: Joyce
line: Oh, honey, I'm gonna be fine. Okay? I'm gonna be fine.

name: Hopper
line: I know it will, kid. I know.

name: Hopper
line: Better than any of us. But right now, I need you safe. This thing is after you. It's not after me. Do you understand? Hey... I need you to understand. Okay?

name: Mike
line: Hey. We should probably go. Mike?

name: Hopper
line: Yeah. Will you explain it to him, please?

name: Joyce
line: We have two options here, Jim. We can turn the machine off, or we can explode it.

name: Joyce
line: Says the man who built it!

name: Murray
line: Yeah, and we wanna explode it!

name: Joyce
line: Or else our heroic efforts will be for naught! This is a three-man operation, Jim, not two.

name: Mike
line: El, you're bleeding. Are you okay?

name: Nancy
line: You can't be serious. Come on! Didn't your mom just buy this car?

name: Nancy
line: Did you leave the lights on?

name: Jonathan
line: Whoa, whoa, whoa! Just stop, stop!

name: Nancy
line: Back in the mall! Back in the mall! Go! Go, go, go!

name: Murray
line: So then I yank those cables like I'm pulling weeds.

name: Joyce
line: And that'll set off the alarm...

name: Murray
line: According to Alexei, may his soul rest in peace. Which should give you two an opening to retrieve the keys from the vault.

name: Joyce
line: And then we just follow the map to the observation room, turn the key...

name: Murray
line: Kaboom, we blow this sucker sky-high.

name: Joyce
line: Yeah. And then, once the rift is closed, we escape back through the vents.

name: Hopper
line: Oh, God, just because it wasn't your plan doesn't mean it was a bad plan.

name: Murray
line: I didn't say it was a bad plan.

name: Murray
line: I did not make a noise.

name: Hopper
line: What is up with you and noises?

name: Murray
line: Children! Children! It is a good plan. A solid B, which is laudable, given the situation and time constraints. Dare I say, if it all goes right...

name: Murray
line: Documents, important documents... for the Lieutenant-Comrade! He called us, last minute. Pardon our sloppy appearance.

name: Joyce
line: Yeah, sure you did. What are you doing?

name: Steve
line: Jesus, how far is this place, man?

name: Steve
line: Suzie must be pretty special, huh? I mean, if you built this thing and lugged it all the way to the middle of nowhere just to talk to her?

name: Dustin
line: I mean, nobody's scientifically perfect, but Suzie's about as close to being perfect as any human could possibly be.

name: Erica
line: She sound made-up to me. She sound made-up to you?

name: Steve
line: Why are you hesitating, Steve? I'm... I'm... I'm not! I'm not! I think she sounds real. You know, totally, absolutely real.

name: Steve
line: Jesus! Hang on! Henderson, where are we going?!

name: Dustin
line: Yes, we are. Come on, baby. Come on, baby!

name: Steve
line: Come on! Come on. Come on! Guess the Toddfather has its limitations.

name: Mike
line: Scoops Troop, do you copy? Scoops Troop, do you copy? Scoops Troop, do you copy? Scoops Troop, I repeat, do you copy? We're trapped in the mall and in need of emergency transportation. Scoops Troop, do you copy? Billy has found us. He has disabled our car and we are trapped in the mall. Repeat: Billy has disabled our car and we are trapped in the mall. Scoops Troop...

name: Max
line: You're gonna kill him, aren't you?

name: Hopper
line: This is just a precaution, okay?

name: Max
line: And not just against Billy. If he knows we're here, so does the Mind Flayer.

name: Mike
line: Scoops Troop, I repeat, we are in need of emergency transportation. Do you copy? Scoops Troop, do you copy?

name: Jonathan
line: No chance that thing'll drive, right?

name: Dustin
line: We don't need it to drive.

name: Dustin
line: We just need the ignition cable.

name: Russian Soldier 7
line: Who needs sunlight when we have one another, comrade?

name: Hopper
line: Why are you talking so much?

name: Hopper
line: Yeah, I mean, we should probably invite him over after all this is done.

name: Joyce
line: Yeah, I can bake him a casserole.

name: Hopper
line: Get a six-pack, share some laughs. You know, have a drink.

name: Dustin
line: Bald Eagle, do you copy? Bald Eagle, I repeat, this is Scoops Troop, do you copy?

name: Murray
line: Bald Eagle. This is Bald Eagle!

name: Dustin
line: Good to hear your voice, Bald Eagle. What's your 20?

name: Murray
line: We reached the vent. I'll contact you when I need you. Until then, silence.

name: Dustin
line: Roger that, Bald Eagle. This is Scoops Troop, going radio silent. 10-10, over.

name: Murray
line: Remember, if anyone says anything, just...

name: Jonathan
line: Push! All right, great. All right, now, all the way. Ready? Three, two, one... Push!

name: Nancy
line: How do we get it open?

name: Jonathan
line: Uh, there should be a latch. Check under the wheel. You see it?

name: Dustin
line: Hurry! Close it now! Close it!

name: Max
line: Mike. Mike. Mike, get up. Mike, can you hear me? Mike! Mike! Hey, come on. You okay?

name: Eleven
line: Seven... feet. You told her... the wave was seven feet.

name: Eleven
line: You ran to her, on the beach. There were seagulls. She wore a hat... with a blue ribbon. A long dress... with a blue and red flower. Yell... Yellow sandals, covered in sand. She was pretty. She was really pretty. And you... you were happy.

name: Max
line: Close it now! Close it! Billy? Billy. Billy, Billy, get up, please. Billy, get up, please, please. Billy... Billy, wake up. Billy, get up. Please, Billy... Billy! Billy... Billy... It's okay. It's okay. It's okay. It's okay.

name: Joyce
line: Don't shoot! American! We're Americans! Americans!

name: Male Reporter
line: Welcome to Hawkins, Indiana, a wonderful place to grow up, to raise your family, to walk your dog. But then... on July Fourth, everything changed. A terrible tragedy struck this small town. But this was not this small town's first brush with tragedy. Mysterious deaths, government cover-ups, a bizarre chemical leak. Is it all linked? All a vast conspiracy? The fault of a disgraced, corrupt mayor? Or is something more going on in the heartland? Can a town itself be cursed? Some believe a rise in Satanism is to blame. To find out, tune in tonight at 8:00 p.m. for 'Horror in the Heartland' on Cutting Edge.

name: Steve
line: You put your mom down as a reference?

name: Robin
line: Yeah. Why not? She's, like, super well-respected.

name: Robin
line: Uh, just to be clear, we weren't fired, you know. The mall burned down and, like, killed a bunch of people.

name: Robin
line: Uh... The Apartment, Hidden Fortress, Children of Paradise.

name: Steve
line: The one with the teddy bears. Duh. No? Uh... Oh, the one that just came out. The movie that just came out. The one with the DeLorean and Alex P. Keaton, and he's trying to bang his mom. The time... Yeah, those are my top three. Classics.

name: Robin
line: Will you just, um... Will you give us a minute?

name: Robin
line: All right, you have to understand, Keith, I know his taste is a bit pedestrian, but the dingus has other qualities.

name: Keith
line: He's a douchebag of the highest order, Robin.

name: Robin
line: He was a bit of a prick to us in high school, I'll grant you that, but he remains... a total chick magnet.

name: Keith
line: Yeah, okay, and this is relevant to me how?

name: Robin
line: Uh, Earth to Keith. The ladies will come in just to see him. They'll come in in droves. Droves, Keith. We sold so much ice cream, they had to get a second shipment in from Michigan. Goddamn Michigan, Keith. And these ladies... These ladies are hot. They're so very hot. And there are too many of them for little Steve. He needs assistance. He needs your assistance, Keith.

name: Keith
line: What's in it for you? You got a thing for him or something?

name: Robin
line: We're just, um... We're just friends.

name: Steve
line: Oh! Fast Times. Fast Times. Ever heard of it?

name: Max
line: Wait, did we get that verse right? It's 'unfold behind the clouds'?

name: Lucas
line: Yeah, but you're butchering it, so could you please stop?

name: Lucas
line: Yeah, come on, Dusty-bun, why don't you join us?

name: Dustin
line: You guys are so funny, you should be on Carson.

name: Max
line: Can't we just hear your rendition?

name: Dustin
line: No. No way. It's reserved for Suzie's ears and Suzie's ears alone.

name: Dustin
line: Stop! You guys, please, shut up.

name: Mike
line: Whoa, dude. That's the donation box.

name: Will
line: I know. I'll just use yours when I come back.

name: Mike
line: I mean, if we still wanna play.

name: Will
line: Yeah, but what if you want to join another party?

name: Jonathan
line: Seventeen years of my life... packed up in one day.

name: Nancy
line: What if I just... don't let you go?

name: Jonathan
line: I think... the new owners might kick us out.

name: Nancy
line: You could stay in our basement.

name: Nancy
line: We could hide you in a tent, like El.

name: Jonathan
line: As a wise man once said... we've got shared trauma.

name: Nancy
line: So what's a little more, right?

name: Mike
line: They'll come back. I know they will.

name: Mike
line: Because you know that I'm gonna steal Cerebro from Dustin and call you so much, you're gonna have to turn it off, right? Did you talk to your mom?

name: Mike
line: Yeah. Yeah, yeah, yeah. I got the okay. I'll be there. And then I was thinking maybe you could come up here for Christmas. And Will, too. You can come before or after Christmas, or whatever Mrs. Byers wants, but I was thinking Christmas Day could be super fun, because we'd all have cool new presents to play with and, uh... Sorry, that made me sound like a seven-year-old.

name: Mike
line: Yeah, cool. Yeah. I like... I like presents, too. Cool.

name: Eleven
line: Remember that day... at the cabin, you were talking to Max?

name: Mike
line: Um... I don't think I follow.

name: Eleven
line: You talked about your... your feelings, your heart.

name: Mike
line: Oh. Oh, yeah, that. Man, that was so long ago. Um... That was really heat of the moment stuff, and we were arguing and... I don't really remember... What did I say, exactly?

name: Joyce
line: Uh... It... It's the speech Hop wrote for you and Mike.

name: Eleven
line: He never talked to you, did he? Can I read?

name: Hopper
line: There's something I've been wanting to talk to you both about. I know this is a difficult conversation, but I care about you both very much. And I know that you care about each other very much. And that's why it's important that we set these boundaries moving forward, so we can build an environment... where we all feel... comfortable... trusted... and open... to sharing our feelings. Feelings. Feelings. Jesus. The truth is, for so long, I'd forgotten what those even were. I've been stuck in one place, in a cave, you might say. A deep, dark cave. And then, I left some Eggos out in the woods, and you came into my life and... for the first time in a long time, I started to feel things again. I started to feel happy. But, lately, I guess I've been feeling... distant from you. Like you're... you're pulling away from me or something. I miss playing board games every night, making triple-decker Eggo extravaganzas at sunrise, watching westerns together before we doze off. But I know you're getting older. Growing. Changing. And I guess... if I'm being really honest, that's what scares me. I don't want things to change. So, I think maybe that's why I came in here, to try to maybe... stop that change. To turn back the clock. To make things go back to how they were. But I know that's naive. It's just... not how life works. It's moving. Always moving, whether you like it or not. And, yeah, sometimes it's painful. Sometimes it's sad. And sometimes... it's surprising. Happy. So, you know what? Keep on growing up, kid. Don't let me stop you. Make mistakes, learn from 'em, and when life hurts you, because it will, remember the hurt. The hurt is good. It means you're out of that cave. But, please, if you don't mind, for the sake of your poor old dad, keep the door open three inches.

name: Eleven
line: I'll be out in a minute.

name: Prisoner
line: No, I'm begging you... No! Don't! No! Please! No! Don't! No, don't! Don't do this! Let me go! Let me go! Don't leave me in here. Let me out, I'm innocent. I'm innocent! I'm begging you, please!
